title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Kandarin

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

content:
Contents

  • 1 Easy
  • 2 Medium
  • 3 Hard
  • 4 Elite
  • 5 Master

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 15 tasks available, there are a total of 150 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete the Gnome Stronghold Agility Course Complete a lap of the Gnome Stronghold Agility Course. 1 Agility N/A
Catch a Crimson Swift in the Feldip Hills Catch a crimson swift in the Feldip Hills. 1 Hunter N/A
Complete a Fishing Trawler Game Complete a Fishing Trawler game at Port Khazard. N/A N/A
Receive a Slayer Task From Steve Receive a slayer task from Steve in the Tree Gnome Stronghold. 5 Combat level N/A
Defeat a Tortoise With Riders in Kandarin Defeat a tortoise with riders in Kandarin. N/A N/A
Visit the Tree Gnome Village Visit the Tree Gnome Village. N/A N/A
Visit the Tree Gnome Stronghold Visit the Tree Gnome Stronghold. N/A N/A
Complete Monk's Friend Complete the Monk's Friend quest. See quest page N/A
Complete Tower of Life Complete the Tower of Life quest. See quest page N/A
Complete Sea Slug Complete the Sea Slug quest. See quest page N/A
Brimstail Rune Essence Mine teleport Have Brimstail teleport you to the Rune Essence Mine. N/A N/A
Equip a Marksman Chompy Hat Equip a chompy bird hat. N/A Requires Big Chompy Bird Hunting completed
Equip a Monkey Backpack Equip a monkey backpack. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Ardougne Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Ardougne Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Complete the Easy Kandarin Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Kandarin Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 26 tasks available, there are a total of 1,300 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Fletch 50 Maple Longbow (u) in Kandarin Fletch 50 maple longbow (u) in Kandarin. 55 Fletching N/A
Pickpocket a Knight of Ardougne 50 Times Pickpocket a Knight of Ardougne 50 times. 55 Thieving N/A
Complete the Barbarian Outpost Agility Course Complete a lap of the Barbarian Outpost Agility Course. 35 Agility Requires Alfred Grimhand's Barcrawl completed.
Trap a Spined Larupia in the Feldip Hills Trap a spined larupia in the Feldip Hills. 31 Hunter N/A
Equip a Spottier Cape Equip a spottier cape. 66 Hunter 69 Hunter for catching the dashing kebbits.
Catch a Red Salamander Catch a red salamander outside the Ourania Altar. 59 Hunter N/A
Enter the Fishing Guild Enter the Fishing Guild. 68 Fishing N/A
Move Your House to Yanille Move your player-owned house to Yanille. 50 Construction N/A
Check a grown Papaya Tree in the Gnome Stronghold Check the health of a papaya tree you've grown in the Tree Gnome Stronghold. 57 Farming N/A
Defeat a Mithril Dragon Defeat a mithril dragon in the Ancient Cavern. N/A N/A
Equip a Dragon Scimitar Equip a dragon scimitar. 60 Attack Requires Monkey Madness I completed.
Set Up a Dwarf Cannon Set up a dwarf multicannon. N/A Requires Dwarf Cannon completed.
Enter the Ranging Guild Enter the Ranging Guild. 40 Ranged N/A
Enter the Wizards' Guild Enter the Wizards' Guild in Yanille. 66 Magic N/A
Defeat a Bloodveld in Kandarin Defeat a bloodveld in Kandarin. 50 Slayer [note 1] or one of [note 2]
Defeat a Fire Giant in Kandarin Defeat a fire giant in Kandarin. N/A N/A
Use the Chivalry Prayer Use the Chivalry prayer. 60 Prayer, 65 Defence Requires completion of the Camelot training room.
Equip an Iban's Staff (u) Equip an iban's staff (u). 50 Magic, 50 Attack 400,000 to both repair and upgrade the broken Iban's staff.
Requires either Fremennik or Tirannwn area
Win a Game of Castle Wars Win a game of Castle Wars. N/A N/A
Complete Elemental Workshop II Complete the Elemental Workshop II quest. See quest page N/A
Complete the Observatory Quest Complete the Observatory Quest. See quest page N/A
Defeat the Penance Queen Defeat the Penance Queen in Barbarian Assault. N/A N/A
Complete the Medium Ardougne Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Ardougne Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Equip an Ogre Forester Chompy Hat Equip an ogre forester chompy hat. 30 Ranged, 5 Fletching 300 chompy bird kills.
Equip a Karamja Monkey Backpack Equip a Karamja monkey backpack. 48 Agility 100 laps around the Ape Atoll Agility Course.
Complete the Medium Kandarin Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Kandarin Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
  1. ^ Stronghold Slayer Cave requires a bloodveld slayer task, which is available only by unlocking Morytania.
  2. ^ The task's description may not be accurate and may be exploited. The bloodveld doesn't need to be located or defeated in Kandarin; defeating a bloodveld anywhere while the player is in Kandarin will count for the task.

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 16 tasks available, there are a total of 1,600 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Pickpocket a Hero Pickpocket any Hero. 80 Thieving N/A
Complete the Seers' Village Agility Course Complete a lap of the Seers' Village Rooftop Course. 60 Agility N/A
Catch 50 Red Chinchompas in Kandarin Catch 50 red chinchompas in Kandarin 63 Hunter Requires Eagles' Peak completed
Catch a Monkfish Catch a monkfish at the Piscatoris Fishing Colony. 62 Fishing N/A
Equip a Full Angler's Outfit Equip a full set of angler gear. 34 Fishing N/A
Defeat a Demonic Gorilla Defeat a demonic gorilla in the Crash Site Cavern. N/A N/A
Equip a Fighter Torso Equip a fighter torso. 40 Defence N/A
Defeat a Cave Kraken Defeat a cave kraken in Kraken Cove. 87 Slayer, 50 Magic N/A
Equip a Trident of the Seas Equip a trident of the seas. 75 Magic 87 Slayer, 50 Magic, and a slayer task to kill the cave krakens/krakens.
Use the Piety Prayer Use the Piety prayer. 70 Prayer, 70 Defence Requires completion of the Camelot training room.
Enter the Myths' Guild Enter the Myths' Guild. N/A Requires The Fremennik Provinces to enter.
Complete the Hard Ardougne Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Ardougne Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Reach Level 5 in Any Barbarian Assault Role Reach level 5 in any Barbarian Assault Role. N/A N/A
Equip an Ogre Expert Chompy Hat Equip an ogre expert chompy hat. 30 Ranged, 5 Fletching 1,000 chompy bird kills.
Equip a Maniacal Monkey Backpack Equip a maniacal monkey backpack. 48 Agility 500 laps around the Ape Atoll Agility Course.
Complete the Hard Kandarin Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Kandarin Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 20 tasks available, there are a total of 5,000 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete the Ardougne Agility Course Complete a lap of the Ardougne Rooftop Course. 90 Agility N/A
Check a grown Dragonfruit Tree in Catherby Check the health of a dragonfruit tree you've grown in Catherby. 81 Farming N/A
Defeat a Smoke Devil Defeat a smoke devil in the Smoke Devil Dungeon. 93 Slayer Requires a slayer task to attack.
Equip Some Zenyte Jewelry Equip any piece of zenyte jewellery. N/A N/A
Equip a Heavy Ballista Equip a heavy ballista. 75 Ranged N/A
Equip an Abyssal Tentacle Equip an abyssal tentacle. 75 Attack Requires 87 Slayer and 50 Magic to get a whip and kraken tentacle to create this.
Defeat the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil Defeat the thermonuclear smoke devil in the Smoke Devil Dungeon. 93 Slayer Can be killed once without a slayer task.
Equip an Occult Necklace Equip an occult necklace. 70 Magic Requires 93 Slayer to kill smoke devils.
Equip a Dragon Full Helm Equip a dragon full helm. 60 Defence N/A
Defeat the Kraken Boss 250 Times Defeat the Kraken boss in Kraken Cove 250 times. 87 Slayer Requires a slayer task to attack.
Defeat the Kraken Boss 500 Times Defeat the Kraken boss in Kraken Cove 500 times. 87 Slayer Requires a slayer task to attack.
Defeat the Kraken Boss 750 Times Defeat the Kraken boss in Kraken Cove 750 times. 87 Slayer Requires a slayer task to attack.
Defeat 300 Demonic Gorillas Defeat 300 demonic gorillas in the Crash Site Cavern. N/A N/A
Defeat 750 Demonic Gorillas Defeat 750 demonic gorillas in the Crash Site Cavern. N/A N/A
Defeat 1500 Demonic Gorillas Defeat 1500 demonic gorillas in the Crash Site Cavern. N/A N/A
Reach Level 5 in Every Barbarian Assault Role Reach level 5 in all four Barbarian Assault Roles. N/A N/A
Equip a Dragon Archer Chompy Hat Equip a dragon archer chompy hat. 30 Ranged, 5 Fletching 2,250 chompy bird kills.
Equip a Kruk Jr. Monkey Backpack Equip a kruk jr. monkey backpack. 48 Agility 1,500 laps around the Ape Atoll Agility Course.
Complete the Elite Kandarin Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Kandarin Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Complete the Elite Ardougne Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Ardougne Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip All Zenyte Jewelry Equip every piece of zenyte jewellery. N/A N/A
Enhance a Trident of the Seas Enhance a trident of the seas or Trident of the swamp. N/A Requires 87 Slayer
Equip an Expert Dragon Archer Chompy Hat Equip an expert dragon archer chompy hat. N/A 4,000 chompy bird kills.
Equip a Prince Awowogei Monkey Back Equip a Prince Awowogei Monkey Back. 48 Agility 2,000 laps around the Ape Atoll Agility Course.
